briefTitle: Comparison Study of Different Tumor Biopsy Method for Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial of Comparison of Tumor Biopsy Method of Preoperative Vacuum-Assisted, Core Needle Versus Intraoperative Excisional Biopsy for Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Identification rates of sentinel lymph node biopsy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* clinically lymph node negative breast cancer patients T1-T3

Exclusion Criteria:

* history of breast cancer locally advanced breast cancer and metastatic breast cancer proven axillary lymph node metastasis history of axillary excisional or incisional biopsy, or dissection history of neoadjuvant chemotherapy pregnancy non-consented patients
